name: Volleyverse - PGMMV Summer Game Jam 2020
description:
A "pong-with-gravity" volleyball game made with Pixel Game Maker MV for Summer Game Jame 2020.

Players have to score by landing the ball on opponent's ground. If success, 1 point for the player successfully it.

Score 5 points and the game ends. Player who scores 5 points win.

How-to-Control (Player 1 and Player 2)

Controller (X-Input Recommend) :

Left and Right : D-Pad / Directional Pad (Left - Right)

Jump  : A Button
Strike : X Button

Reset : Back + Start / Select + Start

Keyboard:

Up    :  Up key
Down  :  Down Key
Left  :  Left Key
Right :  Right Key

Jump  :  X key
Strike :  Z key

Menu bar : F1

Reminder : The game does not have 'VS CPU' so it requires 2 players. You must have at least a(1) controller and a keyboard, or two(2) controllers to play.
           Once execute the game, it identifies which is player one and player 2 for controller and keyboard. Here's how.

           If the game start and press controller's button, the game identifies that the controller is Player 1 and keyboard is Player 2.
           If the game start and press keyboard's key, the game identifies that the keyboard is Player 1 and controller is Player 2.
           If both players have controllers, the game decides who is Player 1 and Player 2.

Tiles by Matwek https://matwek.itch.io/

Music by PANICPUMPKIN
